actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to subject persons involved in the resolution of insolvent financial institutions to federal conflict of interest and disclosure laws.

summary.text: Deems any individual who performs functions or activities of a Federal agency or Government corporation which is carrying out responsibility for resolving insolvent financial institutions and who is under the direct supervision of any officer or employee of such agency or corporation to be an employee of such agency or corporation for purposes of Federal financial disclosure requirements and conflict of interest laws.

titles.title: A bill to subject persons involved in the resolution of insolvent financial institutions to federal conflict of interest and disclosure laws.
